de.ityx.ocr.ocrservice.api

Interface VOCRConfigurationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VOCRConfigurationServiceClient, VOCRTrainerServiceImpl

    public interface VOCRConfigurationService

    • Method Detail

      • removeProfile

        void removeProfile(String profile)
        Remove all data associated with a profile, the documents and all trained models.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to remove.

      • addDocument

        VOCRTrainset addDocument(String profile,
                       String uri,
                       VOCRTrainset[] trainsets)
        Add documents to the internal document repository. This method takes the same document ocred by different engines as an array. It is merged inside the implementation and the merged result will be returned. The uris of all trainsets must be identical and must match the uri argument, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown. If the document already exists it updates the existing document.
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.
        uri - The uri/uri of the ocred document.
        trainsets - An array of trainsets. Each trainset must contain one and only one engine and must represent the same document.
        Returns:
        The merged trainset.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • updateDocument

        void updateDocument(String profile,
                  String uri,
                  VOCRTrainset trainset)
        Update a merged document that has been changed. Unlike addDocument(), this method does not perform any merging. The updated trainset must already be merged.
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.
        uri - The uri/uri of the ocred document. This uri must already exist in the document repository.
        trainset - The updated trainset.

      • removeDocument

        void removeDocument(String profile)
        Remove all documents belonging to a profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.

      • removeDocument

        void removeDocument(String profile,
                  String uri)
        Remove a single document from the document repository.
        Parameters:
        profile - The name of the VOCR profile.
        uri - The uri/uri of the ocred document. This uri must already exist in the document repository.

      • listDocumentIds

        List<String> listDocumentIds(String profile)
        List all document ids currently in the document repository.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile all documents should be get for.
        Returns:
        The ids of the documents currently in the document repository.

      • listDocumentMetadata

        List<VOCRTrainset> listDocumentMetadata(String profile)
        List all documents currently in the document repository. This method only returns the metadata of the VOCRTrainset. The original payload must be obtained by calling getDocument.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile all documents should be get for.
        Returns:
        The metadata of the documents currently in the document repository.

      • getDocument

        VOCRTrainset getDocument(String profile,
                       String uri)
        Retrieve a single document from the document repository.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile the document should be get for.
        uri - The uri of the document to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The document identified by profile,uri or null if there is no document.

      • exportConfiguration

        String exportConfiguration(String profile)
        Export the VOCR configuration identified by profile. THe configuration will be serialized into a xml string. If the given profile contains no model or more than one model (instances of VOCRModel), no model is included in the export.
        Parameters:
        profile - The VOCR profile that should be exported.
        Returns:
        A (XML-)String representing the configuration for a specific vocr configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the given configuration could not be serialized to a string.

      • importConfiguration

        void importConfiguration(String xml)
        Import the VOCR configuration identified by profile. Tee configuration will be deserialized from a xml string and saved to the database under the name/profile it was saved. If the configuration does not contain a VOCR model, a new model must be created.
        Parameters:
        xml - A (XML-)String representing the configuration for a specific vocr configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the given xml string could not be deserialized.

      • getModelStatus

        ModelStatus getModelStatus(String profile)
        Returns the current model status of the VOCR trainer service.
        Parameters:
        profile - The VOCR profile the model status is retrieved from.
        Returns:
        The current model status.

      • getModelAccuracies

        Map<String,Double> getModelAccuracies(String profile)
        Returns for the given profile a map containing the accuracies for each single OCR engine and the VOCR engine. The accuracies are within the range [0, 1]. The VOCR engine is identified with the key VOCRTrainer.VOCR_NAME, i.e., VOCR. An empty map is returned if no model accuracies can be found for the given profile. An IllegalStateException is thrown if no or more than one model is persisted in the database.
        Parameters:
        profile - The VOCR profile the model accuracies should be retrieved from.
        Returns:
        a Map containing the accuracies of all single OCR engines and the VOCR engine.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if for the given profile
